analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x31cdbe64e0fb45e636b2b8cef03ece785be411e2.sol:
	Contract ROB has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0x31cdbe64e0fb45e636b2b8cef03ece785be411e2.sol#289)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x31cdbe64e0fb45e636b2b8cef03ece785be411e2.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (/unique_contracts/0x31cdbe64e0fb45e636b2b8cef03ece785be411e2.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Ownable.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x31cdbe64e0fb45e636b2b8cef03ece785be411e2.sol#66-68) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_spender' of ROB.increaseApproval (/unique_contracts/0x31cdbe64e0fb45e636b2b8cef03ece785be411e2.sol#222) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_addedValue' of ROB.increaseApproval (/unique_contracts/0x31cdbe64e0fb45e636b2b8cef03ece785be411e2.sol#222) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_spender' of ROB.decreaseApproval (/unique_contracts/0x31cdbe64e0fb45e636b2b8cef03ece785be411e2.sol#230-231) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_subtractedValue' of ROB.decreaseApproval (/unique_contracts/0x31cdbe64e0fb45e636b2b8cef03ece785be411e2.sol#231-232) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of ROB.burn (/unique_contracts/0x31cdbe64e0fb45e636b2b8cef03ece785be411e2.sol#297) is not in mixedCase
